title: Hextech Chest
body: How do we get these? i got an ultimate skin and need hextech chests to get the orange essence. How do we get them for free???

replies.body:
Hextech chests can be earned by earning an S-, S, or S+ rank in a match. You can earn one chest per champion each season. You'll also get a chest if someone in your premade earns an S rank in your match, but it still counts for that champion for the rest of the season. 

For a complete rundown on how this system works, check out our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide). Let me know if you have any questions.
